casebody.data:
In re Daniel BLACK, Bankrupt. Irving Trust Company, as Trustee in Bankruptcy, Ignatz Spitzer, and Albert Kalabza, Appellees. Daniel Black, Bankrupt, Appellant. No. 78. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 7, 1931. McManus Ernst & Ernst, of- New York City (Irving L. .Ernst and Lester D. Melzer, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Krause & Hirseh, .of New York City (George C. Levin, of New York City, of counsel), for trustee-appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
